derivation: from G303 (ἀνάγκη) and the base of G43 (ἀνάγκη);
kjv_def: distress, must needs, (of) necessity(-sary), needeth, needful
strongs_def: constraint (literally or figuratively); by implication, distress
outline:
1. necessity, imposed either by the circumstances, or by law of duty regarding to one's advantage, custom, argument
  2. calamity, distress, straits
